name: miro-board-translator
description: This is a miro plugin that translates items of miro boards using deepl.com

scripts.postpatch: git add package* && git commit -m "chore: set version to $npm_package_version" package*
scripts.postminor: git add package* && git commit -m "chore: set version to $npm_package_version" package*
scripts.postmajor: git add package* && git commit -m "chore: set version to $npm_package_version" package*
